alldb.table_sql: SELECT P.ID as equipid, p.PROJ_ID as projid , p.EQIP_ID as eqipid , p.EQIP_NAME as eqipname, p.EQUIP_PLACE as equipplace, P.DICT2.NAME_ as equiptypename, p.DICT2.ID_ as equiptype, P.DICT3.NAME_ as equipclassname, p.DICT3.ID_ as equipclass, P.EQUIP_CONTRACT_NUM as equipcontractnum, P.CHASSIS_NUM as chassisnum, P.CHASSIS_NUMBER as chassiisnumber, p.model_ as modelname, p.model_ as model, P.GARAGE_DATE as garagedate, P.SALE_DATE as saledate, p.EQUIP_NUM as equipnum , P.PURCHASE_PRICE as purchaseprice, P.SALE_PRICE as saleprice, P.SALE_PRICE-P.PURCHASE_PRICE as differential_swap, P.PURCHASE_TAX as purchasetax, P.INSURE_MONEY as insuremoney, P.LEASING_MONEY as leasingmoney, p.DICT.NAME_ as devicetypename, p.DICT.ID_ as devicetype, CI2.CUST_NAME as manufacturername , p.manufacturer as manufacturer, decode(p.IS_AFFILIATED,'0',p.AFFILIATED_INFO,ci.cust_name) as purchaseunit, iifo.ID_CARD as idcard, -- 身份证号码/组织机构代码 iifo.CAR_NAME as carname, -- 机动车辆生产企业名称 iifo.BRAND_MODEL as brandmodel, --厂牌型号 iifo.CERTIFICATE as certificate, --合格证号 iifo.INLET_CERTIFICATE as inletcertificate, --进口证明书号 iifo.MOTOR_NUMBER as motornumber, --发动机号码 iifo.LOCALITY as locality, --产地 iifo.INSPECTION as inspection, --商检单号 iifo.PRICE_TOTAL as pricetotal, --价税合计 iifo.TONNAGE as tonnage, --吨位 iifo.CONFINED_NUM as confinednum --限乘人数 FROM proj_info pi left join PROJ_EQUIP P on p.proj_id=pi.id left join cust_info ci on ci.id=pi.cust_id LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI2 ON P. MANUFACTURER = CI2.ID LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI3 ON P. VNDR = CI3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT ON P.DEVICE_TYPE = DICT.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT2 ON P.EQUIP_TYPE=DICT2.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT3 ON P.EQUIP_CLASS=DICT3.ID_ left join invoice_apply_info iifo on iifo.equip_id=p.id WHERE P.PROJ_ID='{proj_id}' and iifo.ID_CARD is null
